mapper.select: select Distinct InvCode as cInvCode,cc.cInvName as cInvName,cc.cInvStd as cInvStd from UFDATA_002_2020.dbo.mom_orderdetail aa LEFT JOIN UFDATA_002_2020.dbo.mom_order bb on aa.Moid=bb.MoId LEFT JOIN UFDATA_002_2020.dbo.Inventory cc on aa.InvCode=cc.cInvCode where MoCode = #{workOrder}
